title: Ticket #2285: CMake 2.6 is good enough for PROPER builds
description:
Right now, we require cmake 2.8. I propose the attached patch to take the requirement to 2.6, as this is really the minimum version needed for building Condor. 2.8 is only needed if you want a non-PROPER build.

This patch is currently what I use to get things to build on RHEL5.
